titles.title: A bill to include Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, Illinois, to the Lincoln National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
This bill adds Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, all in Illinois, to the Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area.
